class DiverseCF[source]

DiverseCF(configs:Union[typing.Dict[str, typing.Any], DiverseCFConfig], data_module:Optional[TabularDataModule]=None) :: LocalCFExplanationModule

data_configs = {
    "data_dir": "assets/data/s_adult.csv",
    "data_name": "adult",
    "batch_size": 256,
    'sample_frac': 0.1,
    "continous_cols": [
        "age",
        "hours_per_week"
    ],
    "discret_cols": [
        "workclass",
        "education",
        "marital_status",
        "occupation",
        "race",
        "gender"
    ],
}
m_configs = {
    "sizes": [50, 10, 50],
    "dropout_rate": 0.3,
    'lr': 0.03,
}
t_configs = {
    'n_epochs': 1,
    'monitor_metrics': 'val/val_loss'
}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from cfnet.training_module import PredictiveTrainingModule
from cfnet.train import train_model

training_module = PredictiveTrainingModule(m_configs)

params, opt_state = train_model(
    training_module, 
    TabularDataModule(data_configs), 
    t_configs
)

dm = TabularDataModule(data_configs)
pred_fn = lambda x: training_module.forward(params, random.PRNGKey(0), x, is_training=False)

cf_exp = DiverseCF(
    configs=DiverseCFConfig(n_steps=1000)
)
cf_exp.update_cat_info(dm)

X, y = dm.test_dataset[:]
cf = cf_exp.generate_cf(X[0], pred_fn=pred_fn)
cfs = cf_exp.generate_cfs(X[:100, :], pred_fn=pred_fn)
